translations: 荆棘；石南；用石南根制成之烟斗

sentences.sentence: The young prince said, "all this shall not frighten me. I will go and see this Briar Rose."
sentences.translation: 年轻的王子说：“这一切都吓不倒我。我要去看看这个玫瑰公主。”
布瑞尔·罗丝问道，“我可以吗？”

sentences.sentence: "What are you doing?" asked Briar Rose.
sentences.translation: 布瑞尔·罗丝问道，“你在做什么？”
